full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS GSANG BDAG DRAG PO GSUM DRIL GYI TSOGS MCHOD RDO RJE'I SROG SHING ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS GSANG BDAG DRAG PO GSUM DRIL GYI TSOGS MCHOD RDO RJE'I SROG SHING ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD GUS MNGON PAR MTHO BA'I SBYIN BDAG MI'I DBANG PO CANG JUN SE CHEN S'I LI TSE RING BSAM GRUB NYID KYI THUGS BZHED LTAR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG GI GZUGS BRNYAN LA SPYOD PA @004B GSER TOG NO MON HAN BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSOS 'PHRAL DU SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,) TSUL 'DI CHOS SRID YONGS LA SPYAN YANGS PA, ,DED KHOG CHOS RJE BSHAD SGRUB DBANG RGYAL NAS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE DBANG DU BSGRUBS PA'I DGES, ,SKYE BA'I PHRENG BAR BSHES GNYEN DAM PA YIS, ,RJES SU 'DZIN CING LUNG RTOGS YON TAN GYI, ,BANG MDZOD 'DZIN LA MTSUNGS PA MED PAR SHOG , ,,
author_simple: BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO,
